column2:
"When the hostile is smart,
it's painful how much my stupidity
makes them laugh..."

"I guess I still got a lot to learn. I better keep
copping ideas from your experiences."

"Still, I'm fooling myself if I think that's it.
I need a mega dose of courage, too."

"Hey, you don't have to look at me like you're
in total agreement! I mean, cut me some
slack, will ya?"

"I'm doing the best I can. Who are you to
judge me, anyway?"
